ee samangama ohu sangitha kshethrayen da durasweyi.hariyata ma awurudu 38kata pasu, ‚Äòpara‚Äô nawatha warak gitaraya samanga wedikawata godawanne thama prathama githa sanyuktha thatiya rasikayanata pirinamanu pinisaya.rohana wirasinha, nawarathna gamage, mahinda bandara, miltan piris wani prawina sangithagnyayin samanga chathuranga amarasuriya ha tharanga rathnayaka wani nawa parapure sangithawedin da parakramata thanu nirmanaya karamin ohuge ‚Äòsuwanda salana‚Äô namathi gi ekathuwata dayakathwaya sapaya thibuni.wayasin hatahaya hawiridi wuwath rusapuwen pawa parakrama nonasena tharunyayakin yuktha wuweki. 70 dashakayedi miltan mallawarachchige ‚Äòbathimath rasikayeku‚Äô wu ohu ada dawase gayana nawum gi thulin pawa ‚Äòmallawarachchi‚Äô wilasaya pilibimbau weyi.ithama nihathamani pudgalayaku wana parakrama boru kayiwarukarayaku nowe.
